title: So top lane in solo q is basically renekton + pantheon spam atm
body:
Can we address this riot?

Would be fun to actually play a laning phase top lane and not have to play against those 2 champs that basically says  "lol  you're not playing the game".

replies.body: whats so bad about rene? but panth is just q spam and once he gets a single mana item its basically a fuck you to ever being somewhere that's not under turret
Beyond starting corruption pot, what mana item does Pantheon get in lane?

Renek and panth are not substantially different. Panth spams q and has a point and click stun into damage combo. Renek faceroll combos and denies the ability to CS or even properly trade.

One has sustain via damage block. The other has sustain via manaless q spam.

The answer is always karthus.

Can easily farm safely and can get kills without leaving the lane.

I've been 6/0 before without killing the enemy top  layer or even leaving the lane.
I haven't seen either for a while. I normally get a lot more Darius and GP, since they actually do stuff late game.
cloth 4 pots into a ninja tabi at first back.
